info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 10:43PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Eddy, southern Lea, northwestern Reeves, northwestern Winkler and northern Loving Counties through 1130 PM CDT/1030 PM MDT/... At 1042 PM CDT/942 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 16 miles northeast of Red Bluff Reservoir, or 23 miles north of Mentone, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jal, Jal Airport, Red Bluff Reservoir and Bennett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
